thread.title: Dr. Joanny Liu
thread.title_full: GoDaddy reviewed by Dr. Joanny Liu

author: Dr. Joanny Liu
title: Dr. Joanny Liu
text: My first foray into the world of Godaddy auctions has been an experience and a learning curve. I'd actually paid for the first two domains that I "won" the day I got notice. But two days later I was surprised to get two mails for each domain asking for payment. I know I'd verified my apyment method of choice when I set things up. So called GoDaddy's billing department and got some real help. They checked everything and then set it up correctly and I was able to pay with the way I wanted to pay. All in a few minutes. Thanks for your help and cheerfulness doing it!
